resources.string: Allow MIUI widgets to be displayed in Classic widgets
Always show the status bar clock
The distance between the Task view application icon and the name
Hide the status bar in the task view
Hide the application icons in the task view
Hide the cleanup icon in the task view

Thumbnail size for horizontal task view

Please activate this module in the LSPosed Manager and restart the MIUI launcher once.

The module settings are in the settings of the "Home screen"!

Specific location: Settings - Home screen - Where the "Default launcher" used to be.

Diagnostics:
1.This module currently only support LSPosed 5606 or above, it does not going to support any other Xposed frameworks at present.

2.If you have problem with module activate, follow the opinions below: re-optimize MIUI launcher - disable this module - enable this module - force stop MIUI launcher.

3.When some options are invalid, please check whether the MIUI launcher you installed is the latest ALPHA version. If so, please try to re-optimize MIUI launcher in LSPosed Manager and restart it.

4.The final effect depends on your SoC, MIUI version, launcher version and so on. Please refer to the actual performance.
The entered value will be divided by

The launcher will restart in 2 seconds!

It is detected that you are using this module for the first time, the module will set the default value, and then restart MIUI launcher.\nIf you need further settings, please wait for the MIUI launcher to restart and open the \"Home screen\" settings again.
